attributes.title: gen z
attributes.review:
I am part of the Gen  Z. 
I have no political hate towards our president. But banning an app because he hates China is stupid. Tik tok isn’t just some stupid app we like to use. It brings us together from all over the US. It’s a lot more then just an app. 
If they want to take away an app from us. We are gonna take this app from them.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Hi I downloaded this app because I was trying to give Donald Trump a chance to see if he’s actually worthy of being a president and just the app kept kicking me out and I don’t know why but the app is just horrible and I’m sure others agree with me but this isn’t a good app totally not worth the download

attributes.title: Started going crazy
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get more accustomed with how my family wants me to be raised. I started becoming straight, conservative, and stupid. I then started hearing things like, “ANTIFA is a terrorist organization.”, “Keep America Great”, and “LAW AND ORDER!!”. I have since been sent to a mental institution. Please for the love of god don’t use this app and end up like me.

attributes.title: the ✨w o r s t✨ app ever🥰😍
attributes.review: this all killed me🥰 not that that’s a bad thing, just the way i died. i open the app to see a ✨c h e e t o✨ the cheeto startled me, so i screamed. my scream broke all the windows in my car. since i was now focused on my broken windows, my car went up a ramp without my knowing. the car then broke a world record doing a big jump into outer space😍 once i was in space i fell into a black hole. if the last person i saw wasn’t that cheeto it would have been a cool way to go. but no❤️ also i came back to life. surprise you can’t kill gen z you fake tan cheeto beech.

attributes.title: Accuracy
attributes.review: This app was more about propaganda than anything actually helpful or informative. A lol of discrepancies with information on the app actually being accurate or un biased. For someone so committed to acting off of the constitution and being true to America it’s interesting how often the separation of church and state is just totally ignored

attributes.title: Horrible App.
attributes.review: This app literally took forever to download. I continued to get no stop text from them even though I said “STOP” and I also continued to get notifications when I turned them off. This app is nothing but a spam and is extremely irritating. So horrible. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: Disappointed 😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get closer to our great president ✨🧚 but then as soon as i opened the app i threw up🤮. there’s was a picture of a racist homophobic orange oompa loompa cheeto 🤮 i then realized that it was our president oops 🙊 besides that the app is horrible, it has events for racist white supremacists to meet up 😖 i decided to delete it this app and watch videos of Barack Obama 💕

attributes.title: Wish i could give 0 stars 😡
attributes.review: This app is HORRENDOUS!!! It took 10 DAYS to download. When you open the app you are greeted with the face of the antichrist himself! This is very offensive!!! I am a proud Christian woman and to see these images plastered everywhere is DISGUSTING! I will NOT be recommending this app to anyone. I’ve also heard that it SHARES INFORMATION WITH CHINA! What’s next??? RUSSIA!!!!!!! Horrible app DO NOT DOWNLOAD FOR YOUR OWN SAFETY!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: RATE ONE STAR ITS A VIRUS
attributes.review: this pëdOfïleś’ app is so poorly coded. whenever i first open it, a loud sound popped up and it didn’t even let me sign up . my whole phone crashed and i’m really scared that this app is actually a virus or scam DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS AND PLEASE RATE IT ONE STAR TO GET IT TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE!!!!! i started getting spam messages from multiple random numbers and i’m so scared that this is gonna steal my identity.

attributes.title: Horrible app omg 🤏🍤😫💔🤢
attributes.review:
i was hoping to be able to love and support our 💗hot cheeto💗with this app but was unfortunately met with horrific morbid nudes of the orange.
i’m sueing. this is disgusting. my dogs mothers cat threw i
up all over my $800 rug because of this app’s content. Because of the trauma i have been faced with, i want a full refund and emotional support from Harry Styles. thank you.
